Name: Image.ZoomBlur
Desc: Applies a zoom blur effect to the image.
LongDesc: The ZoomBlur method creates a radial blur effect that simulates zooming in or out from a central point. It supports adjustable strength, number of steps, opacity, and progressive blending for smooth results. Useful for dynamic visual effects and focus simulation.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.ZoomBlur({ centerX: 50, centerY: 50, strength: 30 }); });
